unnormalised: Gp. Capt. Verma received the Vayu Sena Medal for his bravery during Op. Meghdoot, a MoD spokesperson confirmed. unnormalised: Brig. Mehta will be heading the Indian contingent to the upcoming joint military exercise with the US Army in Alaska.
